Author: monke_eat_banana
Content:
Alright fellow weebs, I need your manga/manhua/manhwa/webnovel recommendation. Preferably something light or short (anything I can finish in one whole day of reading). 

Here's my 3x3 so you have an idea of my taste. Ordered from left-to-right, top-to-bottom:
1. Chainsaw Man
2. The Horizon
3. Ao Ashi
4. Made in Abyss
5. Kokou No Hito
6. SSS-Class Suicide Hunter
7. Mayonaka Heart Tune
8. Cosmos
9. How to Survive at the Academy

Feel free to shit on my taste
